body:
I've been back for awhile now but there is so many new members who most likely don't know a lot about me and who i am.I want to meet all of you awesome people. <3 Feel free to ask questions about me below.

A bit about me...
I am a 12 year old boy from England who enjoys running and gaming , i love to meet new people and  socialize.If your ever on TeamSpeak feel free to poke me , as i'm nearly always up for a chat!

 On to the server side of things i have been playing since Mczone days and was a former mod late 2013 to early 2014 before i retired due to school and personal reasons.

I hope to see you guys in game. <3

replies.body:
Me amas?
Do you have skype?
What is the actual real feel in Celsius in your city?
How are you?
Do you want eat a Pizza with me?
Do you have pet?
Do you like animals like lizards?
Do you even PvP?
Were you moderator on another server?
Do you know how to build a nice map?
Would you like become a moderator again?
What's your city?
Do you like ice cream?
If yes, banana ice cream?
Why did you choose your name?
When were you born?
What is your PC's ram?
Do you like Avicus more than OCN?
Am I asking you too many questions?

replies.body:
@Bpirr My life depends on pizza , without it i would physically not be able to be as amazing as i am. C:

@MissCarmel Glad to see you as well :D

@ivifetitaYT 
1)Me Ama's? Um yes? ;c
2)Do you have skype?:Yes i do feel free to add me , claw334,
3)What is the  actual feel in celsius in your city? At this time of year feel like 12 Celsius despite it being winter.
4)How are you?  I am great thank you.
5)Do you want to eat pizza with me? If your not a stalker and it's nice pizza and you pay for the transport then ok. :D
6)Do you have a pet? Yes  i have one fish who sadly is on his way out.
7)Do you like animal like lizards? Sure  , i don't dislike them so yeah.
8)Were you Moderator on a another server? Yes about 3 now including Avicus Mostly with a fairly small community of 20-80 people
9)Do you know how to build a nice map? Depends what you consider a 'nice' map.
10)Would you like to become Moderator again? I have actually already spoke to Fluenza_ about it so we'll see.So to answer your question yes i am looking to be mod again.
11)What's your city? Brighton , stalkers your welcome.
12)Do you like ice cream? It's meh compared to pizza C:
13)Why did you choose your name? well..... i like pizza and i thought 334 sounded cool.sigh. how wrong i was...
14)When were you born? December 27th 2001 so yes it's my Birthday in a week.
15)What is your PC's ram? 8GB
16)Do you like Avicus more then OCN? Of course :D sorry OCN <3
17)Am i asking you to many questions? Na quite bored right now so thank you. :)
